name: Ninja Thief
description:
Synopsis

Become the wealthiest ninja of them all in this arcade-like game!

You will have to be the stealthiest and most skillfull thief by collecting the various coins that appear throughout the level, while evading tons of fruits that - for some odd reason - fall from the sky.  These fruits shouldn't be your only concern, though: you will have to be aware of time as well, so you'd  better collect as many time bonuses as possible while you play. 

Climb to the top of the leaderboards by making the highest score!

Game Instructions
  • Collect coins to earn score.
  • Collect time bonuses to earn more playing time.
  • Collect life bonuses to recover your lost lives.
  • Avoid the fruits to remain alive; each time one of them reaches the ground, you gain additional score.
  • It's 'game over' when you run out of time, or when you have no lives left.
Game Controls
  • Left / Right Arrow Keys: Move
  • 'A' Key: Collect Item
  • 'S' Key: Jump
  • 'ESCAPE' Key: Pause / Resume
